name: cpmultiplane-theme-rljbase
label: rljbase
author: Raffael Jesche
description: Basic styling and skeleton for CpMultiplane.

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:sass
scripts.watch:sass: npm run build:sass && npm run build:sass -- -w
scripts.build:js: browserify assets/js/src/mp.js -s MP | uglifyjs --config-file uglify.json > assets/js/mp.min.js
scripts.watch:js: npm run build:js && onchange "assets/js/src/mp.js" "assets/js/src/mp/*.js" -- npm run build:js
scripts.watch:js:dev: npm run build:js:dev && onchange "assets/js/src/mp.js" "assets/js/src/mp/*.js" -- npm run build:js:dev
scripts.update: npm run generate-preamble-files && npm run build
